title: Cortex Control rep1 RNA-Seq
extract_protocol_ch1: Total RNA was extracted with Trizol (Invitrogen). Poly (A) RNA purification was performed via GenElute mRNA miniprep kit (Sigma).
extract_protocol_ch1.1: RNA libraries were prepared for sequencing using standard Illumina protocols
data_processing.1: Raw reads of each sample were trimmed to remove adaptor sequences and low quality bases, then were aligned to the human genome GRCh37 reference with HISAT2
data_processing.2: The reads of RNA-seq were normalized using Cufflinks
data_processing.3: Differential expressed genes were identified by cuffdiff with the following setting: fold change greater than 2 and adjusted p value less than 0.05
data_processing.5: Supplementary_files_format_and_content: Matrix table with gene counts for every gene in two groups
contact_department: Medical Genetics Institute of Henan Province
